head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GLANTZ, RUTH R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GLANTZ, RUTH R.

block.p: GLANTZ-Ruth R. Of Morris Plains, NJ, on July 19, 2000. Wife of the late Jack Glantz (1996). Loving mother of Susan GlantzTuschman of Madison, CT and Robin Glantz of Washington, D.C., and grandmother of Ariel Ciccone. Also survived by brother Julius Raicer of Morristown, NJ. Born in Brooklyn, NY, raised in Dover, NJ, graduate of New York City School of Interior Design, and member of the ASID for over 25 years. Funeral service was held on July 21. Memorial donations may be made to your local United Jewish Appeal chapter, or to the YMHA/YWHA (92nd Street Y) of NYC.
